objects.description: OwaAuth is a Web shell that appears to be exclusively used by Threat Group-3390. It is installed as an ISAPI filter on Exchange servers and shares characteristics with the China Chopper Web shell.

external_references.description: Dell SecureWorks Counter Threat Unit Threat Intelligence. (2015, August 5). Threat Group-3390 Targets Organizations for Cyberespionage. Retrieved January 25, 2016.

objects.x_mitre_detection: {{LinkById|S0072}} is a Web shell that appears to be exclusively used by {{LinkById|G0027}}. It is installed as an ISAPI filter on Exchange servers and shares characteristics with the {{LinkById|S0020}} Web shell.
